crazyballrun.game

Class GameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.GameSettings

  • public class GameSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameSettings stores user defines game constants (resolution, color depth, refresh rate of the screen, etc.).

    • Method Summary

      • getInstance

        public static GameSettings getInstance()
        Access method for the GameSettings-reference (singleton-implementation).
        Returns:
        the only existing instance of GameSettings.

      • addValue

        public void addValue(java.lang.String key,
            java.lang.Object value)
        Adds a new setting to the GameSettings.

        value - corresponding setting value

      • deleteValue

        public boolean deleteValue(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a setting from the GameSettings.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the setting
        Returns:
        'true' if the key existed in the hashmap and has been deleted successfully from there.

      • getValue

        Looks up a value for a particular setting.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
